sys_ui_message.message: When you resign from our employ, you must complete an Absa Pension Fund Withdrawal Benefit Claim Form indicating whether you wish to: 1. Make a non-taxable transfer of your share of the fund to your new employerâ€™s pension and/or provident fund. 2. Make a non-taxable transfer of your share of the fund to a retirement annuity fund. 3. Make a non-taxable transfer of your money to a pension preservation fund. 4. Leave your fund credit in the fund until a later date ('Defer' your withdrawal date). This is not taxable. 5. Take your share of the Fund in cash (taxable). 6. Please contact the Pension fund on 0860 100 380. If you leave our employ without completing the form, the pension fund will employ tracing agents to obtain your withdrawal option. To find out how your pension fund savings are growing in our fund, please register at: [https://acamember.sanlam.co.za](https://acamember.sanlam.co.za).
